price: И кад гласно говориш – знај да Он зна и шта другом тајно говориш и шта само помислиш!
arabic: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in tajhar bil-qawli fa-innahu yaʿlamu al-sira wa-akhfā
